cx-sx-publisher-mt-abuse-message-title: A lahabali lɛbigibu maa malila $1 din lahabali bi taɣi
cx-sx-publisher-mt-abuse-message-body: Bashini/mashini lahabali lɛbigibu kuli nyɛla lahibali lɛbigibu piligu. A na ni tooi bahuili pɔhim zuɣu, amaa kpaŋmi a maŋa ka a lahabali shɛli a ni lɛbigi maa ni karim ka ŋmani a balli maa.
